summary: Hey. This is Mark Mollineaux, speaking at the behest of the Mark Mollineaux website.
This site contains drawings I've done, and also other things.
Check out my github or twitter. Or keybase, if you want to send me a secret message. No linkedin, because linkedin is spam, and pretty gross.
The medium is ballpoint pen and notebook paper.
Doggerel and such, and whatever else I can't fit somewhere better on this site.
A top 100 list, and links to software I developed for tracking film canons.
Info about an upcoming jokebook with lotsa yuks.
Audio works of musical selection, talk, and radio drama, 2009-present.
Via KZSU, the radio station of Stanford University.
